# udoma_entity_extension (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `entity` (String) The type of entity this extension applies to (property, tenant, etc.).
- `form_definition` (String) The custom form definition used to collect data (JSON string). Use jsonencode() in HCL.
- `key` (String) A unique identifier for this extension within the account and entity type.
- `name` (String) A name for the entity extension.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of what this extension is used for.
- `sequence` (Number) The order in which extensions should be displayed in the UI. Lower numbers appear first.
- `version` (Number) The version number of this extension definition.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (Number) The creation timestamp of the entity extension.
- `id` (String) The ID of the entity extension.
- `updated_at` (Number) The last update timestamp of the entity extension.
